message: Let's split the money evenly, Bob.
I think I deserve a bit more, Alice.
Bob, the value of the money decreases quickly for you. Let's make a deal - I'll take a bit less than last time.
I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and your last offer.
Bob, this is my final offer. It's the same as your offer in round 2, but the money is worth significantly less now. Let's be reasonable and end this.
